sections.heading: acquisition date, defined.Share acquisition date, with respect to any person and any issuing public corporation, shall mean the date that the person first becomes an interested shareholder of the issuing public corporation

sections.text:
21-2445.Share acquisition date, defined.

Share acquisition date, with respect to any person and any issuing public corporation, shall mean the date that the person first becomes an interested shareholder of the issuing public corporation.

SourceLaws 1988, LB 1110, ยง 15.
